description: Ichijouji Ken is a character in the Digimon Adventure 02 anime series. Ken is the final member of the 02 DigiDestined, partnered with Wormmon and holder of the Crest of Kindness. Unlike the other 02 DigiDestined, he lives in Tamachi, which is next to Odaiba. At first, the devious Digimon Kaiser, Ken tried hard to atone for his wicked acts and eventually is helped along the way by Daisuke and the others.
name: Ichijouji Ken
